speaker: President.
english: President. – The next item is the report ( A6-0260/2006 ) by Mr Sifunakis, on behalf of the Committee on Culture and Education, on the protection of the European natural, architectural and cultural heritage in rural and island regions ( 2006/2050(INI) .
original: President. – The next item is the report ( A6-0260/2006 ) by Mr Sifunakis, on behalf of the Committee on Culture and Education, on the protection of the European natural, architectural and cultural heritage in rural and island regions ( 2006/2050(INI) .
